trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around December 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOut for a smoke I observed this object traveling slowly east, When it disapeared behind my apartment I went to the east side of apartment to find that it was gone. No further sightings of this object after it went behind the apartment. Video clip 100_5003 taken immediately after the video with the object shows the east side of apartment with no object.
